use.flag: Provide /usr/bin/init execline script for directly booting 66; The script is available at /etc/66/sbin-init regardless of this flag
Depend on sys-apps/66-tools !!MANY FRONTENDS REQUIRE THIS!!
Depend on sys-apps/s6-linux-utils which many boot-related frontends require
Depend on sys-apps/s6-portable-utils for small tasks in the frontends
Depend on net-misc/s6-networking mainly for inetd-like superservers
